run.script:
source .env
# node --inspect-wait ./packages/msar/dist/bin/msar.js ...
tsx ./packages/msar/src/bin/msar.ts snapshot --stdoutLevel all --logFilePath ./var/snapshot.log --logRequests -u "$(op item get $OP_ITEM --fields username)" -p "$(op item get $OP_ITEM --fields password --reveal)" --sso $SSO --outputPath "$OUT" --pretty  --studentData "$URL"
